name: GOVERNMENT CIO
description: GovernmentCIO was founded in 2010 with a single purpose: to transform government IT.
sampleDescriptions: General activities related to IT as it relates to veterans. Inclusive of activities related to the Department of Veterans Affairs and Congress as it relates to any interest in IT.
